channel.title: Two Tor Browser instances on one Whonix-Workstation
channel.description: Hello. I noticed that Tor Browser Downloader provided by Whonix doesn't support installing two instances of Tor Browser. What if I want to test TB alpha but don't want to remove stable TB? How do I install another instance of TB? Do I need to download TB tar.xz from Tor Project site? Are you going to add an ability to install two TB instances to Tor Browser Downloader? Thank you!

item.title: Two Tor Browser instances on one Whonix-Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Workstation_Security_Hardening#Multiple_Tor_Browser_Instances

but I’d safe the trouble and go for multiple workstations instead.

whonix.org – 17 Sep 19

Multiple Whonix-Workstation ™ - Whonix

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstation ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Two Tor Browser instances on one Whonix-Workstation
